turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu önemli haberi anlatmasam, kimse bilmeyecek.
english_example_sentence: If I were not to tell this important news, nobody would know.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я не рассказал эту важную новость, никто бы не узнал.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu önemli haberi ______, kimse bilmeyecek.
